title: How many inches are in 120 square feet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question : How many inches are in 120 square feet ? Answer: (1) Observation . Question is wrongly framed . It is not tenable in Maths to relate or convert dimensions of length ( in inches) to AREA in square feet. (2) Let re- frame the question this way :- How many square inches are in 120 square feet ? Solution Let an imaginary field have a length of 12 feet (12x 12= 144 inches) and width 10 feet ( 10 x 12 = 120 inches) Area = 12 ft × 10 ft = 120 sq ft = 144 x120 sq inches = 17,280 sq inches. Ans If correct. acknowledge with an up vote. Best Regards .
